website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you like copper cookware and don't want to spend a great deal of money. However, if your cook top is induction, check out others on our shortlist.
pros: Constructed of copper that offers brilliant looks and durability
Ceramic coating resists sticking and is free of PTFE and PFOA
cons: This set won't work well with induction hobs, so it's not a good pick for all cooks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on induction hob!
customer_reviews.text: It’s says in works on induction hobs when it doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: JesseD

customer_reviews.title: these pans do not work with my induction hob
customer_reviews.text: Even though the blurb says they work with induction hob these pans do not work on my brand new Bosch induction hob
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great pan set at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Fab pan set, ideal for me or when the family come round. Easy to clean and food stays hot. I also like the fact you can use on the hob or/and in the oven. Been looking for an affordable pan set for use in the oven, at an affordable price, for a while. Now I have found them! They look more expensive than they cost. Great buy. Can't comment on durability, as I haven't had them long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara07

customer_reviews.title: Guage of metal ?
customer_reviews.text: item delivered next day as promised. THey look as described but are very light /flimsy so it remains to be seen how they last. Unfortunately the ad does not describe their weight or guage and it would be helpful if if did. Have nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laughlan

customer_reviews.title: Top Of The Pots!
customer_reviews.text: As well as looking nice and shiny in their Copper gleaming glory, they do the job. I've used the big pot for boiled veg and to make fried rice on high heat, the smaller pot for custard and gravy (slow boiled milk and stock which can be tricky to clean in a cheap item) and have had no issues whatsoever. Smart, easy to clean, good value kitchenware is what I asked for and certainly what I received, I definitely recommend these pots for a small or starter kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robin Glover

customer_reviews.title: Practical & Decorative set
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid to use these pots when I got them cos I thought they were not durable . ran out of pats and pans & had to use them, they have not tarnished , actually non stick and easy to clean .works on my electric hob
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, a bit small, wish there were a biggest saute pan with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S Leil

customer_reviews.title: Copper BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ive been searching long for a good set of pans and this is just perfect for our home. We use it now daily for supper and it a easy clean and very good for keeping food hot as its copper bases... just love em
customer_reviews.author: efrayim

customer_reviews.title: cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pans after watching the film "dark waters" about the chemicals used and dumped as illegal waste in America manufacturing Teflon Pans -namely P.F.O.A. This led to many deaths from contaminated water. These do not contain any of these chemicals and so I am happy with that. The problem is they are so cheap looking and very light to hand. However they work very well and were not expensive so I think a three score is an honest assessment. Their longevity however is not expected !
customer_reviews.author: antonypo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: They look great, have only use one pan so far but it cooked me a great steak. They are light and appear easy to use, I will update this review in couple of months when I have used them more
customer_reviews.author: steven mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting too much from this set but was pleasantly surprised. They work well on my induction cooktop and the non-stick works well also. Only thing I wish was bigger sizes and a taller pot. But they're cheap and you can't have it all, so pretty happy with these. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A.

customer_reviews.title: These do not do as promised and work with an induction hob
customer_reviews.text: These pans Do Not work with an induction job as guaranteed. Do not buy these pans. I will be asking immediately for a refund from the seller and contact Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Practically  perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans which I bought 6 months ago and use almost every day. For the price they are excellent quality and I'd buy these again over Tefal ones which I'd always previously gone for. They are quite small but for just a single or couple, they're perfect and I love they can go straight from hob to oven. I wish they did larger ones because I'd buy them in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjna Suryavanshi

customer_reviews.title: Great products, great price
customer_reviews.text: Products arrived quickly and packaged well. Have used all 3 and really pleased with the quality. Wash well and look good.
customer_reviews.author: kiii

customer_reviews.title: Delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Looking great ! Very useful for one person . I do use it daily for quick food preparation. They are very useful .
customer_reviews.author: only me

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, I will when I need new pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best pots and pans I have ever bought. Non stick works like a charm, and easy to clean, look great too
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kietzman

customer_reviews.title: Nuvovva Copper  cook  wear
customer_reviews.text: I thought when I ordered these that the 5 piece was 4 saucepans with lids, and frying pan. not 2 saucepans, 2 lids and frying pan. That is all I'm disappointed with other wise the cook wear is brilliant the chips cooked in this chip pan are delicious I can' find any fault in them this cook wear I have been looking for some kitchen utensils to match them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Induction pans!
customer_reviews.text: I’d never used an induction hob before but these are great, heat up quickly & wash up well in the dishwasher. A little pricy though for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, non stick pans. Frying pan is quite small - but the other 2 pans are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I cook delicious meals that are not ruined because they stick to the pan. So worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Glowing
customer_reviews.text: This product looks absolutely brilliant. I just love the copper. Used all three pieces on my new induction hob, they work fine. I never ever, ever give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Delwil61

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid these pans are lovely! Slightly smaller than I thought but they look great, its easy to clean and does a very good job when cooking with them. I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Do not work
customer_reviews.text: These pans unfortunately do not work on an induction job as stated
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work on an induction hob!!
customer_reviews.text: It states quite clearly that these are suitable for an induction hob, but they aren’t! We threw our old pans out then tried to cook with the new ones and couldn’t..not impressed!! IF YOU HAVE AN INDUCTION HOB DON’T BUY THESE !!
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for value; however it doesn’t heat as quickly on the induction hob compared to more expensive pots and pans. Not sure how long the coating will last as it started to chip on the edges. Otherwise happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price ,look good
customer_reviews.text: The pots look nice, are not to heavy, easy to clean happy with them
customer_reviews.author: jacquie murphy

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work on induction hobs.
customer_reviews.text: These pots claim to be induction yet don’t work on any of my hobs. They’re also small and it says it’s a five piece set but is actually a 3 piece. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Booton

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 pot of the set of 3 Worked (2 pots, 1 pan & 2 lids)
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as the pot set looked so lovely online. I have to return the set because once I tried all of the pots, only 1 worked on my induction hob.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK ON INDUCTIOM
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate, doesn’t work on induction hobs so cannot comment on any other aspect as I was forced to send straight back and wait two weeks for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product- good value, great non- stick, easy to clean. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: Great. Until... Only a few months and the small pot doesn't work at all. Won't recognise on the induction hob. Fuming
customer_reviews.author: Elsyo0o

customer_reviews.title: n
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Won't work on induction hob.Gave them to my son to use on his hob.Had to buy new pans from Argos.Should of gone there first.
customer_reviews.author: simon hammant

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan set
customer_reviews.text: Good looking pots easy to clean don’t know about durability haven’t had them long enough Delbert good
customer_reviews.author: G54

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to sales something  which  force promise
customer_reviews.text: They promise it will work induction and it doesn't work totaly west of time
customer_reviews.author: john clemente

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 does not work
customer_reviews.text: Frying pan and large saucepan are fine but the medium saucepan does not allow induction hob to turn on. Seems to be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Simon tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Not value for money
customer_reviews.text: These pans were returned a few months ago and I have been charged for the item I would like a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Nigel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its light on weight so its very comfortable to use, the handles do not get hot and it looks like in the picture, cooking eggs on it all the time, barely use any oil
customer_reviews.author: Almina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Small but look beautiful and easy to clean. Haven’t had it long enough to talk about the durability
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not induction ready, do not buy if you have one.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are not induction ready despite advertising they are. I am in the process of trying to get my money back because they do not work on a hotpoint induction hob. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ciara ahern

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good choice, my boyfriend is a cook and he loves the pan. I love them too, very beautiful, and useful, nothing STICK. NOTHING. I strongly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Check all pans before sent out for delivery
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 pans work induction I bought plz could you send me a small pan that doesn't work the 1 I have thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marie Cameron was not happy with the driver just asking for the surname then walking off bear in mind am off work waiting for an operation on my back

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Sauce pan doesn't work with induction
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the cookware set we were disappointed to find that one of the three pans does not work with induction.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brogden

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for induction hobs!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless on induction hob. These are not Induction ready as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on Induction Hobs
customer_reviews.text: Says it does, it doesn't. 20 mins with pre boiled water and only just a water simmer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: One of the pots don’t work and they are very lightweight. I’ve thrown out packages so don’t think I can return.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Pantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are amazing! You can cook with no oil, they are easy to clean and make your cooking much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Induction
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does NOT work on induction. Waste of money sadly
customer_reviews.author: BFL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on induction hob
customer_reviews.text: They look nice however one of the pans doesn’t work on induction hob?
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Changes how you cook, they make it so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: T D

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really answer the question as I got them for a friend. But they seem to like them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I recommend Beautiful product and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amaral

customer_reviews.title: New to induction pots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son at university who had never used an induction hob before...very easy and looks lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: A liked that they were light weight even when there was food in pan and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: dawn m sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far, really easy to clean the non-stick surface. Great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grant

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: As I bought this item as a gift I am unable to answer these questions at this time Regards Kathleen stakelum.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stakelum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok to make do but small size pans and not the greatest of quality
customer_reviews.author: L. L

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan Set
customer_reviews.text: Great pan set stylish easy to clean great value for money delighted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional value - much more pleasing than anything else at this price
customer_reviews.author: Nigel P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Hotpoint Induction hobs
customer_reviews.text: May work on other Induction hobs but definately not on Hotpoint :(
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ceri Mullen

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product and arrived super quickly! Thank you so much x
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The pans arrived just in time, nothing sticks on it, easy to clean. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Yuleibi g.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work on induction hob
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work on the induction hob even though they are supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good products
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, look good and easy to use and keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Frying pan is rubbish it isn't none stick had to go out and buy new one
customer_reviews.author: Mickeal sean wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The lid on the saucepan above doesn’t fit please advise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great To Look Out And Great Quality BUT BE AWARE HANDLES GET VERY HOT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Stunning Set Of Pans And Easy Clean And High Qualuty !! However Only Downside is because the handles are good quality stainless steel there is Defo Something You Should Know And Found Out The “WARNING IS THAT HANDLES GET RED HOT !!! while cooking so you have to use Oven Gloves or Use TeaTowel to Lift The Saucepans Off The Cooker Or If You Turn Or Shake The Pans During Cooking so BE CAREFUL ! As you will Seriously BURN YOUR HANDS !!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set of pans
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set of pans, colour matches my kitchen and is exactly as in photo. Heat up really well and a hole for steam in glass lid, not too heavy, I'm delighted with them and would recommend. Frying pan isn't huge but is sufficient for me. Read reviews before I bought and as usual the comments were really helpful. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L.O.R

customer_reviews.title: Don’t all work !
customer_reviews.text: The pots were a set of 3 and only one of them worked on my hob. Because of corona virus I couldn’t take them to post office to return them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material/ Non stick/ easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans! Small but useful if you want to cook small portions... Easy to storage and very nice Rose Gold colour... Just what i needed to reduce the size of portions that i used to cook... You won’t be disappointed at all...
customer_reviews.author: Kekel

customer_reviews.title: Super set
customer_reviews.text: These are compact, light, quality set. Love them! Easy to clean and do the job perfectly. I use them on an electric hob with no trouble at all. Nice looking too! Thank you I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pans for little money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pans for our caravan i like that the lids fit frying pan for cleaner cooking i also like the copper look well pleased with my purchase Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MRS C  WOOD

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: easiest pans we have ever had to clean . nothing sticks badly. just a shame they don't do a 5 pan set
customer_reviews.author: n c north

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These do not work on my new Induction Hob. I had my suspicions when I saw the box they came in was littered with spelling mistakes. In the bin they go.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not fully induction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to work with a induction hob, the large pot works fine, however, the smaller pot and pan do not always connect.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Good quality. Been using them almost every day. Easy to clean. Thx
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but non stick coating is a bit thin
customer_reviews.author: darren baldry
